attributes.action: Do not allow a second EU referendum to take place.
attributes.additional_details:
Previously, a petition not to allow the eu referendum  to take place failed.
In the light of this failure, a second eu referendum should not even be considered.
The British public have decided and the elected government should get on with the Job & fulfil the people's wishes.
Artical 50 should be implemented forthwith.
attributes.background: An official eu referendum has taken place and the vote result by the majority of the British people was clearly for LEAVE, so a second eu referendum would be pointless and a total waste of tax payers money.
